titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. E. H. Daniels and Reuben T. Daniels, Indictment
CWG7543

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Caldwell,, Circuit,, Court,,
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
Against } June Term 1865.
E,, H,, Daniels, Reuben,, T,, Daniels,,

The Grand Jury of Caldwell County, in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky: accuse E,, H,, Daniels,, and Reuben, T, Daniels,, of the offence of allowing minors to play on a Jennie Lind Table,, Committed as follows viz, The said E,, H,, Daniels,, Reuben,, T,, Daniels,, on the 10th day of Februrary 1865, and on divers other days and times in the County aforesaid they being the owners and controllers of a gaming Table, called a Jennie Lind Table, and used for gaming purposes and on which money property and other things of value were bett won and lost, did willfully suffer and allow, F,, W,, Dabney,, Robert Overby, W,, H,, Owen,, and William Denny,, to engage at and play games on said table,, without the written permission of their parents or either of them,, said Dabney, Overby, Owen and Denny, being minors under the age of twenty One years at the time aforesaid and against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky,, Information given by=

F,, W,, Dabney
Robert Overby
Tish Overby
W H Owen
William Denny,
J W McCoy
Foreman Grand Jury.
E. P Campbell, Attorney for the Commonwealth

A Copy
attest J C Barnes Clk
By F W Dabney D C

No. 1 } Comlth
vs, } Indictment for permitting minors to game
Daniels & Daniels
a true bill
J W McCoy
foreman grand Jury
Filed & noted in open Court June 13th 1865.
att F W Dabney D C
Issd
A Copy
fee 30,Â¢
Campbell atty
